title: DJ Khaled – I'm the One Lyrics | Genius Lyrics

body.html:
[Intro: DJ Khaled]
We the Best Music
Another one!
DJ Khaled

And you sick of all those other imitators

When I met her in the club I asked her who she felt

We don't got no label

We just watchin' Netflix, she ain't got no cable, okay though
Plug, plug, plug, I'm the plug for her
She want a nigga that pull her hair and hold the door for her
Baby, that's only me, bitch, it okay with me
Baby, okay, okay though

Yeah, you're lookin' at the truth
The money never lie, no

'Cause I've been lookin' for somebody
Not just any fuckin' body
Don't make me catch a body
That's for any and everybody
Oh my God, she hit me up all day, get no response
Bitch, you blow my high
That's like turnin' gold to bronze, roll my eyes
And when she on the molly, she a zombie
She think we Clyde and Bonnie
But it's more like Whitney and Bobby
God, forgive me! Tunechi F finessin', I'm a legend
Straight up out the Crescent
Fly your bae down for the Essence
For the record I knew Khaled when that boy was spinnin' records
Mula Gang, winnin' record

pinned_questions.body: What did Khaled have to say about working with Justin Bieber for the first time?

body.html:
Let me tell you some. I’ve always wanted to work with Justin Bieber. Justin Bieber, first of all, is my friend, a very good person and he’s very big, he’s a super, he’s a megastar. I told myself ‘I’m not gonna ask Justin Bieber to do a record with me until I feel like I’m at a certain point in my career.’ I won’t play myself, because you know the answer I think is probably going to be ‘No,’ but not in a disrespectful way—because he really don’t do features. So I waited to get where I’m at now.

I said ‘Bieber, I got this dream I wanna play for you, I feel we’re good about it.’ And he was like ‘Man, let me hear it.’ And I played the phone and he loved it. You know he knocked out. We shot a video. And he don’t even shoot his own videos. So I’m letting you know the power of love and greatness together. So imagine how big this song is. Yeah I worked with Justin Bieber and it’s incredible.
body.markdown:
Let me tell you some. I've always wanted to work with Justin Bieber. Justin Bieber, first of all, is my friend, a very good person and he's very big, he's a super, he's a megastar. I told myself 'I'm not gonna ask Justin Bieber to do a record with me until I feel like I'm at a certain point in my career.' I won't play myself, because you know the answer I think is probably going to be 'No,' but not in a disrespectful way—because he really don't do features. So I waited to get where I'm at now.

I said 'Bieber, I got this dream I wanna play for you, I feel we're good about it.' And he was like 'Man, let me hear it.' And I played the phone and he loved it. You know he knocked out. We shot a video. And he don't even shoot his own videos. So I'm letting you know the power of love and greatness together. So imagine how big this song is. Yeah I worked with Justin Bieber and it's incredible.

pinned_questions.body: Is there a music video for the track?

body.html:
The music video for “I’m the One” was released simultaneously with the single’s distribution onto music purchasing and streaming platforms. The video would go on to amass over 12 million views in the first 24 hours of release, and over 60 million in the first week.

Directed by Eif Rivera, it was filmed at a luxurious mansion in California in February 2017. While Quavo is the only member featured on the track, all three members of the Migos make an appearance in the video.
body.markdown:
The music video for "I'm the One" was released simultaneously with the single's distribution onto music purchasing and streaming platforms. The video would go on to amass over 12 million views in the first 24 hours of release, and over 60 million in the first week.

Directed by Eif Rivera, it was filmed [at a luxurious mansion in California](https://www.bustle.com/p/where-was-justin-bieber-dj-khaleds-im-the-one-video-filmed-it-truly-looks-like-paradise-54372) in [February 2017.](http://www.stereogum.com/1926929/dj-khaled-teases-im-the-one-video-with-justin-bieber-chance-the-rapper-migos-lil-wayne/news/) While Quavo is the only member featured on the track, all three members of the [Migos](https://genius.com/artists/Migos) make an appearance in the video.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=weeI1G46q0o

pinned_questions.body: How did DJ Khaled react to the track becoming #1 on Billboard's Top 100?

body.html:
On Instagram, Khaled posted:

Fan luv we did it!! I have been blessed to have many #1s
BUT THIS IS MY FIRST #1 and MY SON @asahdkhaled FIRST #1 on the @billboard #HOT100 “Debuted #1 on the Billboard Hot 100” !!!!!!! Key 🔑 word Debuted !

These the things that Michael Jackson does !! Team work make a dream work!! #DJKHALED feat @justinbieber @quavohuncho @chancetherapper @liltunechi team work !!!!!! Bless up more team work!!!
@wethebestmusic team and my @epicrecords team bless up @scooterbraun @poobear @letmeseeyou team work @scooterbraun JB thank u the love y'all showing me is so amazing I’m so grateful real talk thank u we did it !!!! @laried no word can explain how #GRATEFUL I am to you!
body.markdown:
On [Instagram,](https://www.instagram.com/p/BT2BAqyAQJL/) Khaled posted:
>Fan luv we did it!! I have been blessed to have many #1s
BUT THIS IS MY FIRST #1 and MY SON @asahdkhaled FIRST #1 on the @billboard #HOT100 "Debuted #1 on the Billboard Hot 100" !!!!!!! Key 🔑 word Debuted !

>These the things that Michael Jackson does !! Team work make a dream work!! #DJKHALED feat @justinbieber @quavohuncho @chancetherapper @liltunechi team work !!!!!! Bless up more team work!!!
>@wethebestmusic team and my @epicrecords team bless up @scooterbraun @poobear @letmeseeyou team work @scooterbraun JB thank u the love y'all showing me is so amazing I'm so grateful real talk thank u we did it !!!! @laried no word can explain how #GRATEFUL I am to you!

user.about_me_summary:
Hi, I’m Chase. I transcribe and annotate new releases, whether it’s rap, pop, r&b, or even dancehall. You can click here to see all the popular songs I’ve transcribed on the site!

I’m a busy guy and I frequently get messages so don’t take it personally if I don’t get yours right away. If I end up not responding to your message, feel free to send another one.



If I rejected or deleted your annotation, it’s nothing personal. Just doing my job and keeping up with the current Genius standards. Please do not send me angry messages, demanding to know why your annotation was deleted, otherwise, you will be ignored and action may be taken on your account. Send me a constructive and calm message, then we can talk.



First activity on Genius: February 27, 2017

Made Editor by @ewokABdevito on April 4, 2017

Made Mediator by @Drew_Harvie on June 13, 2017 (I accidentally removed it at some point so I gave myself the role again on December 18, 2018)

Made Moderator by @Empath on October 23, 2017

author.name: Chase Williams #BLM

pinned_questions.body: Have Chance The Rapper and Justin Bieber appeared on the same track before?

body.html: This is the pair’s third collaboration. The first found Chance appearing on Bieber’s “Confident” from his album Journals. The favor was returned on “Juke Jam,” from Chance’s third solo project, Coloring Book.
body.markdown: This is the pair's third collaboration. The first found Chance appearing on Bieber's ["Confident"](https://genius.com/Justin-bieber-confident-lyrics) from his album [*Journals*.](https://genius.com/albums/Justin-bieber/Journals) The favor was returned on ["Juke Jam,"](https://genius.com/Chance-the-rapper-juke-jam-lyrics) from Chance's third solo project, [*Coloring Book.*](https://genius.com/albums/Chance-the-rapper/Coloring-book)

Kid from the southside of Chicago. Deep love and appreciation for lyricism and poetic flow in the rap game. Fan of words and wordplay.

Generally in love with hip-hop culture, its evolution, and its history. Will listen to anything once.

Also, I’m in med school. It’s hard.

pinned_questions.body: Have Lil Wayne and Quavo appeared on the same track before?

body.html: Yes, this is their second collaboration. Quavo’s group Migos and Tunechi first worked together on the track “Amazing Amy” on Weezy’s Sorry 4 Da Wait 2.
body.markdown: Yes, this is their second collaboration. Quavo's group Migos and Tunechi first worked together on the track ["Amazing Amy"](https://genius.com/Lil-wayne-amazing-amy-lyrics) on Weezy's [*Sorry 4 Da Wait 2*.](genius.com/albums/Lil-wayne/Sorry-4-the-wait-2)

pinned_questions.body: Have Lil Wayne & Chance The Rapper ever appeared on the same track before?

body.html: Yes, this is their third collaboration. Chance The Rapper had a guest feature on Lil Wayne’s “You Song” from his mixtape Dedication 5 in 2013. Last year, Lil Wayne appeared on Chance’s third mixtape Coloring Book on the hit single “No Problem,” which also featured 2 Chainz.
body.markdown: Yes, this is their third collaboration. Chance The Rapper had a guest feature on Lil Wayne's ["You Song"](https://genius.com/Lil-wayne-you-song-lyrics) from his mixtape [*Dedication 5*](https://genius.com/albums/Lil-wayne/Dedication-5) in 2013. Last year, Lil Wayne appeared on Chance's third mixtape [*Coloring Book*](https://genius.com/albums/Chance-the-rapper/Coloring-book) on the hit single ["No Problem,"](https://genius.com/Chance-the-rapper-no-problem-lyrics) which also featured [2 Chainz.](https://genius.com/artists/2-chainz)

pinned_questions.body: Have Quavo & Chance The Rapper ever appeared on the same track before?

body.html: Yes, this is their second collaboration. Quavo had a guest feature on “Familiar,” a song from Donnie Trumpet & The Social Experiment’s Surf. The Social Experiment is Chance’s band, where he acts as lead vocalist.
body.markdown: Yes, this is their second collaboration. Quavo had a guest feature on ["Familiar,"](https://genius.com/Donnie-trumpet-and-the-social-experiment-familiar-lyrics) a song from Donnie Trumpet & The Social Experiment's [*Surf*.](https://genius.com/albums/Donnie-trumpet-and-the-social-experiment/Surf) [The Social Experiment](https://genius.com/artists/The-social-experiment) is Chance's band, where he acts as lead vocalist.

pinned_questions.body: Has the release date for his album been announced yet?

body.html: Yes, on the 5th of June 2017 Dj Khaled announced the release date of his 10th studio album, Grateful, through his twitter:
body.markdown:
Yes, on the 5th of June 2017 [Dj Khaled](https://genius.com/artists/Dj-khaled) announced the release date of his 10th studio album, [Grateful,](https://genius.com/albums/Dj-khaled/Grateful)  through his twitter:

https://twitter.com/djkhaled/status/871687872511959042

body.html:
In the video, Chance’s Gucci belt is censored for what the internet can only speculate is due to not getting the proper licensing from Gucci, which may very well be the case.

Generally, logos/products will get blurred from media for one of 2 reasons: the content creator is avoiding legal action from the brand or the content creator wishes to solicit an advertising opportunity to the brand.

After the video’s release, Chance tweeted about the blurring:
body.markdown:
In the video, Chance's Gucci belt is censored for what the [internet can only speculate](https://www.reddit.com/r/ChanceTheRapper/comments/684p30/chances_lawyers_forgot_to_get_the_rights_to_the/?st=jkagk6pe&sh=262a71ab) is due to not getting the proper licensing from Gucci, which may very well be the case.

Generally, logos/products will get blurred from media for one of 2 reasons: the content creator is avoiding legal action from the brand or the content creator wishes to solicit an advertising opportunity to the brand. 

After the video's release, Chance tweeted about the blurring:

https://twitter.com/chancetherapper/status/858040705717063680?lang=en

annotatable.title: I'm the One

body.html: These are some of Khaled’s trademark catchphrases, which he often exclaims in his songs. We the Best Music Group is the record label Khaled founded in 2008, and “Another One” is his long-standing way of announcing that he has another hit on his hands.
body.plain: These are some of Khaled’s trademark catchphrases, which he often exclaims in his songs. We the Best Music Group is the record label Khaled founded in 2008, and “Another One” is his long-standing way of announcing that he has another hit on his hands.
body.markdown:
These are some of Khaled's trademark catchphrases, which he often exclaims in his songs. [We the Best Music Group](http://www.wethebestmusicgroup.com/) is the record label Khaled founded in 2008, and ["Another One"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FSswEzWJdWo) is his long-standing way of announcing that he has another hit on his hands.

http://images.genius.com/d9fddd531f177afa8df6498f11eda808.886x499x24.gif

appearance.label: news
appearance.title: DJ Khaled’s Hit Single “I’m The One” Has Been Certified Platinum

appearance.label: news
appearance.title: DJ Khaled’s “I’m The One” Debuts At No. 1 On The Billboard Hot 100

description.html:
“I’m the One” features a star-studded line-up of artists in especially braggadocio spirits, with Justin Bieber, Chance The Rapper, Lil Wayne and Quavo boasting to the women in their lives that they are “the only one” for them. “I’m the One” is Khaled’s second single from his 2017 album Grateful, following the February release of “Shining.”

The collaboration was teased throughout videos and pictures via the Instagram profiles of the featured artists, showing the making of the music video.

The song debuted at No.1 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart and UK Official Singles Chart. It became the second song to debut at #1 on the Hot 100 in 2017 making it Bieber’s second feat and Khaled’s first.
description.markdown:
"I'm the One" features a star-studded line-up of artists in especially braggadocio spirits, with Justin Bieber, Chance The Rapper, Lil Wayne and Quavo boasting to the women in their lives that they are "the only one" for them. "I'm the One" is Khaled's second single from his 2017 album *Grateful*, following the February release of ["Shining."](https://genius.com/Dj-khaled-shining-lyrics) 

The collaboration was [teased](https://www.instagram.com/p/BTXftbmAnih/?taken-by=djkhaled) throughout videos and pictures via the Instagram profiles of the featured artists, showing the making of the music video.

The song debuted at No.1 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart and UK Official Singles Chart. It became the second song to debut at #1 on the Hot 100 in 2017 making it Bieber's second feat and Khaled's first.

user.about_me_summary:
Hi, I’m Chase. I transcribe and annotate new releases, whether it’s rap, pop, r&b, or even dancehall. You can click here to see all the popular songs I’ve transcribed on the site!

I’m a busy guy and I frequently get messages so don’t take it personally if I don’t get yours right away. If I end up not responding to your message, feel free to send another one.



If I rejected or deleted your annotation, it’s nothing personal. Just doing my job and keeping up with the current Genius standards. Please do not send me angry messages, demanding to know why your annotation was deleted, otherwise, you will be ignored and action may be taken on your account. Send me a constructive and calm message, then we can talk.

user.name: NinHawk

body.html:
I feel like the meaning to the song is pretty interesting. With every verse that comes up, their relationship with that specific girl gets worse and worse…

Quavo is head over heels about his girl. They’ve known each other since they were young and he thinks she beautiful no matter if she has makeup on or not. He compares their relationship to the infamous power couple, “Bonnie and Clyde”.

Chance the Rapper talks about a girl who is a poser and actually has no financial stability at all. She attempts to flex with liquor bottles, but she doesn’t even have a table, cable TV, etc. She mooches off him and he’s her “plug”. However, he still messes with her even though he’s supplying her every financial need.

Lil Wayne talks about a girl who he absolutely despises. He says she blows his high every time she talks to him, that she’s always braindead whenever she on Molly, and that he doesn’t even answers her calls anymore. Like Quavo, he also compares their relationship to a famous couple… However, instead of Bonnie and Clyde, he compares their relationship to Whitney Houston’s and Bobby Brown’s. Full of toxic behavior, drug abuse, and which ultimately ended in a huge divorce. (Side Note: Whitney Houston also died recently from a drug overdose)

user.about_me_summary:
Product @ Genius

Feel free to message me! But if you need help with the site or otherwise need a timely response, please reach out to @streetlights or @WriteNProppa.

❄️🐝




Learn how to annotate, transcribe, add song facts, and earn roles by reading our guides.
Tag @transcribers for help with lyrics and @genius-editorial-board and @mentors for help with annotations.
Stay in touch with new site features and fun projects by following the Genius Updates forum.
Get involved with other contributors by creating or joining discussions in the Music, Genius Ideas, and Genius Help forums.
Report problems with the website by posting about them in the Bugs forum.
Don’t delete your account—we’ll miss you! But if you really want to, just send @streetlights a message.
